mapper.sql: a.id, a.username, a.password, a.phone, a.email, a.created, a.updated AS "update"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user ( id, username, password, phone, email, created, updated ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{created}, #{update} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tb_user AS a WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_user SET username = #{username}, password = #{password}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, created = #{created}, updated = #{update} WHERE id = #{id}
